title: Subtracting from a Negative
text: Although you may be tempted to say that $$-3-1$$ is $$-2$$, because $$3-1$$ is $$2$$, remember that $$-2=-3+1$$
speech: Although you may be tempted to say that  minus 3 minus, 1  is  negative 2 , because  3 minus, 1  is  2 , remember that  negative 2 is equal to, negative 3 plus 1
pacedSpeech: Although you may be tempted to say that   minus 3 minus, 1
, remember that   negative 2 is equal to, negative 3 plus 1
